text: Kevin Itabel (born 20 August 1993) is an Argentine footballer who plays as a midfielder for Deportivo Camioneros. ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine footballers Category:Argentine Primera División players Category:Primera B Nacional players Category:Club Atlético Tigre footballers Category:Atlético de Rafaela footballers Category:Ferro Carril Oeste footballers Category:Panetolikos F.C. players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Argentine expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Greece
title: Kevin Itabel
